titles: A true report of the great costs and charges of the five hospitals in the City of London under the care of the Lord Mayor, communalty and citizens of London, in the maintenance of their great number of poore this present yeare 1649. as followeth.
notes: A report on Christ's hospital, St. Bartholomew's, St. Thomas's, Bridewell, and Bethlem.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "26 march at ye Spittle".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: St. Bartholomew's Hospital (London, England) --  Early works to 1800.
